snippet: Adrian Peterson will face a bigger test this week against the Broncos, whose defense has held opponents to 82.7 rushing yards a game, sixth best in the N.F.L.
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson will face a bigger test this week against the Broncos, whose defense has held opponents to 82.7 rushing yards a game, sixth best in the N.F.L.

headline.main: Minnesota Vikings at Denver Broncos Preview
